description.narrative: 6.1 Decision-makers, entrepreneurs, civil society and families are more aware of and involved in advocacy and social mobilization for the rights of children, which contributes to Operations Support To Programme Delivery, Other Cross-Sectoral Programme Areas. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Evaluations, Research And Data, Operational Support To Programme Delivery, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: In 2019, decision-makers, entrepreneurs, civil society and families improve their knowledge, practices and attitudes regarding children's access to their rights

mailing-address.narrative: c/o UNDP Casilla de Correo 1107 Asuncion

description.narrative: Other General Services other general services

title.narrative: Paraguay United Nations Development Assistance Framework
UNICEF Contract Awards through the UN Global Marketplace

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 6.1 Decision-makers, entrepreneurs, civil society and families are more aware of and involved in advocacy and social mobilization for the rights of children

description.narrative: Decision makers, civil society, families and entrepreneurs are more aware and become involved in advocacy and mobilization activities for children and adolescents. | Status:Met | As-of Date:04/12/2019

title.narrative: 1.2. Numero de nuevos compromisos asumidos por autoridades e influenciadores en apoyo a iniciativas impulsadas por Unicef.
1.1 Nmero de nuevas alianzas locales en las cuales UNICEF est involucrado, que invierten recursos en nios y nias excluidos.
1.3. Cantidad de noticias vinculadas a temas promovidos por Unicef.
Numero de seguidores en redes sociales que comentan temas de ninez.

baseline.value: 9.110 en Facebook , 13.500 en twitter, 1000 en Instagram

title.narrative: Percentage of coverage that includes UNICEF's key messages (including, but not limited to, quotes from spokespeople, Goodwill amabassadors, and corporate partners) in the context of country priorities

baseline.value: 90% of positive news that mention UNICEF from at least 200 news published

target.value: 2019:98% positive news out of 400 published news

title.narrative: Number of people reached through digital assets of UNICEF (unique website visitors, social media supporters and subscribers, mobile initiatives)

baseline.value: Growth average of 1000 new followers per year in Fb, Twitter and Instagram. At least 1000 visitors who returned to the Web Page per year.

target.value: 2019:2000 new followers in Fb, Twitter and Instagram. At least 2000 visitors who returned to the Web Page.

actual.value: 2019:9365 new followers in Fb, Tt, YT and Instagram. Con nueva web aumentaron de 7900 a 37.562 usuarios de Página Web en el tercer trimestre
